name: Red Game Without A Great Name
description: Fly, Die, Retry. Don’t be fooled by the game’s crazy title and pretty looks. It’s a challenging 2D arcade game where you play as a mechanical bird traversing a hostile Steampunk world. Prepare to die a lot on barbed wire, spikes, and sawblades. Your only means of survival is your ability to teleport!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Pixel Shader 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Played the hell out of it on my phone, having fun with PC version too. It's entertaining, looks and sounds nice, gets difficult really quick. So if you're in for a challenge - just grab it, it's well worth the price.          YouTube™ Video:  Red Game Without a Great Name • PC gameplay • 1080p 60FPS • Levels 7-10

It actually has a great name, not bad. Anyways, it's a cute little game with pretty visuals, it's that kind of rinse of repeat gameplay that you'll have to die again and again till you memorize the patterns and understand how to avoid the death traps, it can get boring after a while, unless you play it on occasions everynow and then.  6/10
